first_utt: Yesterday my car ran out of oil and broke down. I could not believe I would let such a thing happen!

first_utt: I recently remembered a sweet memory of my aunt who recently passed away.

yeah i bet. at least you got to know her for as long as you did

first_utt: I bought a 20 foot boat. I believe it will be able to handle the large lake that I will be taking it on.

first_utt: I was at the park today and almost stepped on a rattle snake. I almost jumped out of my skin.

Nothing is going to get in the way of that." For some reason, it worked a charm ;-)
